attributes.action: To make it more difficult for criminals to get scam mail into the UK postal system and adopt the same or similar methods used by Australian Post
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of elderly and vulnerable people are receiving and replying with cash to scam mail 
Last year 22,000 victims replied with cash to one scam in one-day sending approx £500,000 
Criminals are selling on names and addresses to scammers worldwide.
 Victims can receive 30/40/50 over 100 scam letters a day and are emptying bank accounts and selling homes to keep up with the demands of criminals who befriend/ trick & threaten them daily.
Think Jessica . Com would like more done to stop criminals having an easy and assisted passage into the UK and make it more difficult for scammers to hide behind PO Box address in this country.
